com.b2international.commons.exceptions

Class FormattedRuntimeException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • com.b2international.commons.exceptions.FormattedRuntimeException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ApiException, BranchMergeException, ImportException

    public class FormattedRuntimeException
extends java.lang.RuntimeException
    Exception using String.format(String, Object...) to create a final exception message.
    Since:
    4.1
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FormattedRuntimeException(java.lang.String template, java.lang.Object... args)
      Creates a new FormattedRuntimeException with the specified template and args.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Throwable

        addSuppressed, fillInStackTrace, getCause, getLocalizedMessage, getMessage, getStackTrace, getSuppressed, initCause, printStackTrace, printStackTrace, printStackTrace, setStackTrace, toString

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • FormattedRuntimeException

        public FormattedRuntimeException(java.lang.String template,
                                 java.lang.Object... args)
        Creates a new FormattedRuntimeException with the specified template and args. If arguments are defined, and the last argument is a Throwable instance, then it will use to populate the Throwable.getCause() property.
        Parameters:
        template - - the format to use in String.format(String, Object...), may not be null
        args - - the args to use in String.format(String, Object...), may be null
        See Also:
        RuntimeException.RuntimeException(String, Throwable)
